99c5dde3-1c24-41f4-9fc0-fd183c88673e.title: Laser Cutter
99c5dde3-1c24-41f4-9fc0-fd183c88673e.description: Cut anything to your heart's desires! Robots are also vulnerable to the laser beam.

7b39bac2-a64c-4256-b530-e2e3fd611e24.title: Mountable Laser Cutter
7b39bac2-a64c-4256-b530-e2e3fd611e24.description: The mountable version of the Laser Cutter! You can adjust the range and damage dealt to bots by interacting with the part.

e3bd2dd1-1bb0-4964-b46c-d4d58cfec074.title: Laser Pistol
e3bd2dd1-1bb0-4964-b46c-d4d58cfec074.description: Shoots piercing projectiles of death! This bad boy is also capable of firing a higly explosive projectile! Press 'R' to activate overdrive!
